TopicTitle: Wiki organization now that there are two games

Articles.Content:
Given that KSP2 is a completely different game from KSP, but includes things that were already present in KSP, I'd like to know how the wiki would work now that there are two games.
 

If nothing is changed, and KSP and KSP2 info both go in the same wiki, then I will politely ask anyone who wants to modify the KSP wiki with fresh info from KSP2 to keep whatever information there is from KSP1 if they want to modify a page that already exists and contains informations from KSP or, even better, to create a new page and link it to the category KSP2 (or at least to put all KSP2 info in a separate section).
This is to hopefully prevent loss of any knowledge about KSP that may be beneficial for new, and current, KSP1 players.
In this case [nothing is changed], a small warning could be put in the wiki make it clear for everyone.

If a new wiki is created, then I'll ask what will its URL be and when it will be available.

 

Thanks.
